feed.title: Clashofclans - Esport News
feed.subtitle: RSS wrapper of Clashofclans inbox Esport News

entry.title: Welcome to Clash Esports!
entry.content:
Hi Chief,

Welcome to the World of Clash of Clans Esports! To help you along, weâ€™ve gathered the most relevant information about the Clash of Clans competitive scene in this article. This will be your go to when wondering what tournaments are coming up and what is ongoing right now, but also for checking out some of the past tournament information.

This article will be frequently updated with new information so make sure you come back here to be up-to-date with what's happening!

Ongoing tournaments

Time for action! Here is a list of all Supercell supported Clash of Clans tournaments that are ongoing at the moment. Whether you're looking to play or watch, make sure to read the details below.

Clash of Clans World Championship 2024

The Clash of Clans World Championships are back for yet another year of amazing clashing! With a total of $1.000.000 on the line & 6 Golden Tickets up for grabs (4 from the monthly competitions, 1 from the Chinese Regional Qualifier and 1 from the Last Chance Qualifier), this is YOUR chance to secure a ticket to the Clash Worlds Finals!

Snapdragon Pro Series Season 6

The Snapdragon Pro Series returns for its 6th season!

With a $50,000 prize pool on the line, this is a competition not to miss!

  • Participation Criteria: All TH16 players of a season must be residents and physically located in one of the countries specified for their region in point 1.4 of the Rulebook. All players of a season must be 16 years of age or older to participate in the series.

  • Prize Pool: $50,000

  • Rules: Read all the rules in SPS's Official Rulebook HERE!

  • Status: Upcoming

  • Signups: Open, sign up HERE.

  • Follow the Snapdragon Pro Series on X (previously known as Twitter) to stay up to date with everything SPS Related!

Past tournaments

Below youâ€™ll find some of the past tournaments where Clash players have battled for World Championship titles, prize money and glory. Check out some of the best plays and strategies from the best in the world and learn a trick or two!

Clash of Clans World Championship 2023

The Clash of Clans World Championships was back for yet another year of amazing clashing! With a total of $1.150.000 on the line & 8 Golden Tickets up for grabs (4 from community-organised tournaments & 4 from the official Championship Qualifier), this was the chance to secure a ticket to the Clash Worlds Finals that were held in Helsinki, Finland from the 24th to the 26th of November!

In order to participate, players needed to be at least 16 years old and have the highest Town Hall level.

  • The World Championship was free to play. Players were not required to pay anything to register and/or play.

  • Status: Finished

  • Winner: Clash Champs

  • Rewatch the entire competition here, or if you prefer to skip ahead to the main event, check out each day's stream below:

    • Day 1

    • Day 2

    • Day 3

Global Clash Cup Season 9

A brand new season of the Global Clash Cup was upon us and promised to be a heart-pounding thrill ride! From Town Hall 16 to 10, there were 10 electrifying divisions to choose from with $19,000 up for grabs for the boldest Clashers. The Gothic Division Champion will won a Silver Ticket to the World Championship Last Chance Qualifier!

  • Participation Criteria: Players must be at least 16 years of age to participate, subject to applicable laws and regulations of their country of residence. For players aged 16 to 17 (16 to 18 in South Korea and 16 to 19 in Japan), a parent or legal guardian must complete and submit the Parental/Legal Guardian Consent Form provided by GCC. 1.1.15. Players must reside in a country where Clash of Clans is available to download in the local application store and be the sole owner of the accounts used for participation in the league. Players residing in mainland China are not eligible to participate.

  • Prize Pool: $19,000

  • Rules: Read all the rules in GCC's Official Rulebook HERE!

  • Signups: Closed.

  • Status: Finished

  • Gothic Division (Silver Ticket) winner: Dizi Group

  • Follow GCC on X (previously known as Twitter) to stay up to date with everything Global Clash Cup Related!

Clash Champs' Trophy Race

Organized by Clash Champs, the Trophy Race was a Tournament where the player that got the most amount of trophies in a given time won! Starting with Town Hall 9, the trophy race featured an edition for each Town Hall level up to TH16!

Participation Criteria: All Players that reside in a country where Clash of Clans is available to download in the local app store are eligible to participate.

  • Prize Pool: Gems, Champs Bucks & Clash of Clans Merchandise.

  • Rules: Read all the rules in Clash Champs' Trophy Race official Rulebook!

  • Signups: Closed

  • Status: Finished.

  • Follow Clash Champs on X (previously known as Twitter) to stay up to date with everything Trophy Race related!

Snapdragon Pro Series

The Snapdragon Pro Series returned for another season, and this time the competition was be even more special - players got to test their skill against other players from all around the world!

With a Silver Ticket to the Clash of Clans World Championship Last Chance Qualifier and a $50,000 prize pool on the line, this was a competition not to miss!

  • Participation Criteria: All TH16 players of a season must be residents and physically located in one of the countries specified for their region in point 1.4 of the Rulebook. All players of a season must be 16 years of age or older by the time they participate in the series.

  • Prize Pool: $50,000

  • Rules: Read all the rules in SPS's Official Rulebook HERE!

  • Status: Finished

  • Winner: Millesime MG

  • Follow the Snapdragon Pro Series on X (previously known as Twitter) to stay up to date with everything SPS Related!

Worlds Warmup 2024

The Clash of Clans Worlds Warmup was back in 2024! Featuring Town Hall 16 and a $30,000 USD prize pool it was BOUND to re-ignite the #ClashEsports scene!

To warm up for the 2024 Clash Worlds Championship season, this tournament's format started with 2 Open Qualifiers where 13 qualified teams (top teams from each Open Qualifier) advanced to the Group Stage where 3 Finalist teams from the 2023 World Championship joined them. The top 2 teams of each Group advanced for a face-off in the Playoffs.Â  Participation Criteria: All Players had to be at least +16years old and reside in a country where Clash of Clans was available to download in the local app store.

  • Prize Pool: $30,000

  • Rules: Worlds Warmup Rulebook HERE!

  • Signups: Closed

  • Status: Finished

  • Winner: Synchronic

BLAST Clash!

BLAST Clash was an online tournament where all Town Hall 16 players played for a share of the prize pool.

  • Participation Criteria: Town Hall 16 Players over the age of 16 residing in a country where Clash of Clans is available to download in the local app store can participate.

  • Prize Pool: $15,000

  • Rules: Read all the rules in BLAST Clash's Official Rulebook HERE!

  • Signups: Open - sign up HERE!

  • Status: Finished

  • Follow BLAST on X, Instagram, and the official website to stay updated!

We are always looking for more people to collaborate with and are eager to help our community grow! So if you want to explore running a tournament, start by checking out our Community Tournament Guidelines and reach out to us by email at tournaments@supercell.com!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Team

Apple is not a sponsor of, or responsible for conducting, the promotions or events.

entry.title: Rewatch the GCC's Gothic Division Finals - Day 1!
Rewatch the GCC's Gothic Division Finals - Day 2!
Clash Worlds Finals are coming to SuperFEST!
SuperFEST 2024
entry.content:
Hi, Chief!

Letâ€™s talk SuperFEST 2024! SuperFEST 2024 is a 3-day event that will host the World Finals of the Clash of Clans World Championship, Clash Royale League & Brawl Stars Championship. It is an in-person, live event that will take place in Helsinki, Finland, where fans can come watch their favorite players and teams fight for supremacy and for their claims as World Champions. As this is the first time that Clash of Clans, Clash Royale and Brawl Stars Esports will come together in one grand event, youâ€™re not going to want to miss this!

SuperFEST 2024 will take place November 1 - 3! Check out the SuperFEST 2024 announcement video belowâ€¦

-

ðŸ“º [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

SUPERFEST SCHEDULE

All three events will be played across 3 days and the schedule is as followsâ€¦

Clash of Clans World Championship Finals:

  • Day 1: 10:00 - 13:00 EET

  • Day 2: 10:00 - 13:00 EET

  • Day 3: 10:00 - 13:00 EET

Clash Royale League World Finals:Â 

  • Day 1: 14:00 - 16:30 EET

  • Day 2: 14:00 - 16:30 EET

  • Day 3: 14:00 - 16:30 EET

Brawl Stars Championship Finals:

  • Day 1: 17:30 - 22:00 EET

  • Day 2: 17:30 - 21:30 EET

  • Day 3: 17:30 - 20:30 EET

Buy your tickets now!

Donâ€™t miss out on your opportunity to see history be made! Tickets for SuperFEST 2024 are on sale now - spots are limited, so make sure to secure your ticket as soon as you can!

Tickets can be purchased by visiting the Clash of Clans Event Site

Thatâ€™s it, Chief! Mark your calendars and stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure youâ€™re up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related, and check out the Master Ruleset if you have any questions. All the best clash action will be streamed on our event platform, so make sure to bookmark the Clash of Clans Event Site!

Be on the lookout - More information to come soon for details related to the Clash of Clans World Championship finals!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

entry.title: 2024 Last Chance Qualifier - All You Need To Know!
entry.content:
Hi, Chief!

The Last Chance Qualifier is right on the horizon! Six Teams claiming six Silver Tickets will take the stage in one final bout for a chance to claim the last Golden Ticket in #ClashWorlds 2024â€¦

The Last Chance Qualifier is a two-day double-elimination tournament that will take place September 7 - 8, starting at 14:00 UTC!

HOW DID WE GET HERE?

The 2024 Clash of Clans World Championship has been quite the ride so far! There have been four Monthly Finals, one China Qualifier and two Community Tournaments; five Golden Tickets and six Silver tickets have been awarded throughout the year with the final opportunity to claim the last Golden Ticket coming soon with the Last Chance Qualifier!

The Snapdragon Pro Series Finals took place August 10 - 11, while the Global Clash Cup Gothic Division Finals concluded on August 25, with each tournament awarding one Silver Ticket and the final two slots into the Last Chance Qualifier. Just because the 2024 Monthly Finals have concluded, doesnâ€™t mean that the awesome Clash action is over, as the Last Chance Qualifier is just around the corner!

Letâ€™s get into the detailsâ€¦

TOURNAMENT FORMAT

The Last Chance Qualifier is a two-day, double elimination tournament featuring six teams, similar to the Monthly Finals tournaments throughout the 2024 year. The first two Upper Bracket rounds and the first Lower Bracket round will be completed on Day 1, while all remaining rounds will be played on Day 2.

The six competing teams are the six teams that claim Silver Tickets throughout the year in the April Monthly Finals, May Monthly Finals, June Monthly Finals, July Monthly Finals, Snapdragon Pro Series and the Global Clash Cup. Seeding for the Last Chance Qualifier is as follows...

Seed 1: April Monthly Finals Silver Ticket

Seed 2: May Monthly Finals Silver Ticket

Seed 3: June Monthly Finals Silver Ticket

Seed 4: July Monthly Finals Silver Ticket

Seed 5: Snapdragon Pro Series Silver Ticket

Seed 6: Global Clash Cup Silver Ticket

Now letâ€™s take a look at the teams participating in the Last Chance Qualifier!

As previously mentioned, six teams will be participating in the Last Chance Qualifier! Four teams have been decided from the #ClashWorlds Monthly Finals, while two teams were decided by the outcome of the Snapdragon Pro Series Finals and the Global Clash Cup Finalsâ€¦

The 6 teams, and their respective players, participating in the Last Chance Qualifier are as follows, listed by their seedâ€¦

Seed 1: Vatang consists of Gyul, DP, Frostyyy, KIIIBEROS & LansLota

Seed 2: HTM Esports consists of CELINHO, Pato, Bernaul NTC, Aquiles & Leo

Seed 3: MO Shifters consists of Ahmad, Zkin, Sean, Leo & Imraan

Seed 4: Pulse Gaming consists of NYU, sahara, Chihawa, Lincoln & Wado

Seed 5: Tribe Gaming consists of Cronos, Nebrax, Riqirez, Excosist & Jojo23

Seed 6: Dizi Group consists of Chien, Denden, JaGa, KAI & YueTa

Weâ€™ve got a star-studded cast for the Last Chance Qualifier English broadcast! Three familiar faces from previous Monthly Finals will return; CarbonFin, iTzu & Woody, but there is also a new addition! The man, the myth, the legend Judo Sloth joins the crew for the Last Chance Qualifier!

CarbonFin

iTzu

Judo Sloth

Woody

Community Casters will also be returning for the Last Chance Qualifier! See the list of the Community Casters below...

Spanish: Zolokotroko, shioN, Style, SOCKERS

Portuguese: Bruna7Cr, Rafa COC, Decow, Marinaul

French: Optimus Prime COC, Skarex

German: Noobs iMTV, eVe MAXI

Italian: Haplo80, Medda87

Korean: Fada

Traditional Chinese: Turtle

Filipino: Boss LA

Indonesian: BangSkot, Chief Rian Gaming

WHERE TO WATCH

Look no further - the Clash of Clans Event Site is the best location to watch the Last Chance Qualifier, make predictions, and earn in-game rewards! Think you know which teams have the best shot at claiming the last Golden Ticket and a spot at the World Championship Finals? Want to earn rewards by answering #ClashWorlds trivia AND just by watching your favorite teams clash? The Event Site has it all! Sign in with your Supercell ID on the Clash of Clans Event Site to get access to all the rewards you see in the graphic below!

The Clash of Clans Event Site has 8 language options you can choose from: English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Italian, Korean & Japanese!

English

Spanish

Portuguese

French

German

Italian

Korean

Japanese

Thatâ€™s it, Chief! Mark your calendars and stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure youâ€™re up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related, and check out the Master Ruleset if you have any questions!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

entry.title: Rewatch Day 1 of the Last Chance Qualifier!
Congratulations, Tribe Gaming!
entry.content:
Congratulations to the Last Chance Qualifier Champions - Tribe Gaming!

Hi, Chief!

Throughout the 2024 #ClashWorlds year, six teams received Silver Tickets across six tournament competitions. In the penultimate tournament of the year where these six teams faced off, the last Golden Ticket of the year and the last spot at World Championship Finals has officially been claimedâ€¦

The Clash of Clans World Championship Last Chance Qualifier Golden Ticket winner is decided!

The Last Chance Qualifier was one to remember! After falling to Lower Bracket by the hands of HTM Esports, Tribe Gaming once again faced off against them in the Grand Finals. After two Perfect Wars and forcing a Grand Finals bracket reset, Tribe Gaming came out on top!

Tribe Gaming has claimed the Last Chance Qualifier Golden Ticket and is the sixth team that will attend the World Championship Finals!

Congratulations to Cronos, Nebrax, Riqirez, Excosist & Jojo23!

Rewatch the epic two-day showdown of Tribe Gamingâ€™s road to the Golden Ticket, securing their spot at the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals!

ðŸ“º [EMBEDDED VIDEO] ðŸ“º [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

Take a look at the 6 teams qualified for the World Championship Finalsâ€¦

Congratulations to all players and teams who have competed throughout the #ClashWorlds 2024 year! All six Golden Tickets have been claimed and the stage is set for the biggest event in #ClashWorlds history - The World Championship Finals at SuperFEST 2024 will be an event to remember! Stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure you're up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

entry.title: Rewatch Day 2 of the Last Chance Qualifier!
Signup for BLAST Clash!
entry.content:
Hi Chief,

An exciting new Clash of Clans tournament for all Town Hall 16 teams to participate is right around the corner!Â 

ðŸ“º [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

BLAST is taking esports to the next level with its thrilling events and global reach. Known for bringing together top teams and stars in epic tournaments, BLAST is once again setting the stage for excitement with the upcoming BLAST Bash. During the show, you will be able to watch the best players from all around the world competing in Clash of Clans, Clash Royale, and Brawl Stars.

BLAST Clash 2024 is an exciting online tournament for Clash of Clans where eligible players will have the chance to compete for a spot in the finals.

Format

Players from around the world will compete in 4 Open Qualifiers, with the top 12 teams advancing to a 16 team swiss that will be filled in by another 4 teams that will be directly invited. Top 8 will then proceed to an 8 team elimination bracket finals. Each match will feature a 5v5 war mode lasting around 45 minutes, and each team will have five attacks. Make sure to read the official BLAST Clash Rulebook HERE!

Schedule

  • Open Qualifiers (4): September 14, 15, 21 and 22

  • Closed Qualifier: September 28

  • Finals Show: October 12-13

Invited Teams

The four invited teams that will be joining the Open Qualifier winners for the Closed Qualifier will be the following:

  • NAVI

  • Millesime MG

  • Synchronic Gaming

  • HTM Bra

Prize Pool

The prize pool for BLAST Clash 2024 is set at $15,000. Check out the prize pool distribution below!

  • 1st: $7,500

  • 2nd: $3,500

  • 3rd: $2,500

  • 4th: $1,500

Where to watch

Catch all the action on BLASTâ€™s official Twitch and TikTok channel.

How to participate

To participate, eligible players need to register via the Challengermode website.

Ready for the Ultimate Face-Off?

Sign up for BLAST Clash 2024 today! Donâ€™t forget to follow BLAST on X, Instagram, and the official website to stay updated. Also, keep an eye on Clash of Clans' in-game Esports tab, Esports Instagram, X, and the Esports website for more updates.

entry.title: Signup to Season 6 of the SPS!
entry.content:
Sign up for SPS Season 6!

Hi Chief,

The Snapdragon Pro Series is back for Season 6!

Test your skill against players worldwide and take home a portion of the $50,000 prize pool. Donâ€™t miss your chance - sign up NOW on FACEIT HERE!

This season of the SPS consists of 4 cups played over two days each - best of 1 Single Elimination bracket on the first day, with the top 8 teams advancing to the second day.

Four cup winners (one per cup) will qualify for the Open Finals. The remaining 4 slots in the finals will be seeded based on the overall Leaderboard.

Next follows the Snapdragon Mobile Open Finals played in a double-elimination with a bracket reset format.Â  A two-day competition will determine the winner, who will take home the biggest chunk of the $50,000 prize!

Save the dates in your calendar, team up, and take your shot at greatness!

You can already sign up to all cups in the season here:

  • Cup 1: October 5/6th, 9am CEST

  • Cup 2 - October 19/20th, 5pm CEST

  • Cup 3 - October 26/27th, 9am CET

  • Cup 4 - November 9/10th, 9pm CET

Now that you know the basics make sure to watch the tutorial video below and follow the instructions to sign up!

How to sign up!

ðŸ“º [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

How to sign up:

  • Register a FACEIT account (All players of the team must register an account)

  • Connect your Supercell ID account to FACEIT.

  • Choose the tournament you want to participate in and click submit application.

  • In the application text box, write something similar to â€œIâ€™d like to join, my name is [INSERT PLAYERNAME] on the team [INSERT TEAM NAME].â€

  • Once approved, you will see youâ€™re invited and need to click an orange button to join the tournament.

  • To create your team, follow the prompts in the left-hand window to invite your teammates to your team!

That's all for now! Make sure to follow Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to stay up-to-date with everything #ClashEsports related!

Clash On!

entry.title: 2024 World Championship Finals - All You Need To Know!
entry.content:
The 2024 World Championship Finals is coming!

Hi, Chief!

It has been quite the year so far - after 4 Monthly Competitions, numerous Community Tournaments, a China Regional Qualifier, and finally, the Last Chance Qualifier, the World Championship Finals teams have all been decided! Six teams have put their all into securing their Golden Tickets and are ready to battle it out at the World Championship Finals. Which team will prove themselves the best in the world and crown themselves as World Champions? Weâ€™ll find out soonâ€¦

HOW DID WE GET HERE?

The 2024 Clash of Clans World Championship has been a whirlwind of tough matches and clashes of epic proportion! Starting off with the Silver Tickets, there were four Monthly Finals and two Community Tournaments that awarded a total of 6 Silver Tickets. These Silver Ticket winning teams competed in the Last Chance Qualifier to secure the last Golden Ticket and the sixth spot at World Championship Finals - a Golden Ticket that Tribe Gaming won after completing 6 Perfect Wars consecutively! But that was just the last Golden Ticket, as there were five more that came before!

The remaining five Golden Tickets were awarded from the four Monthly Finals, the April, May, June and July Monthly Finals, and last but not least, the China Regional Tournament!

All 6 teams that will be competing at the World Championship Finals have been grinding their craft all year: from developing attack strategies, adapting to new metas, theorizing winning base layouts, to putting their hearts and souls into becoming the best teams they can be. The World Championship Finals will be the culmination of all the hard work the teams had done this year!

Now, letâ€™s take a closer look at the tournament formatâ€¦

TOURNAMENT FORMAT

The 2024 World Championship Finals consists of 6 teams: 4 teams that advanced through each Monthly Finals, one team that advanced through the China Regional Qualifier, and one team that qualified through the Last Chance Qualifier. These six teams will compete in a 3-day competition consisting of two stages: a Round Robin group stage followed by a 4-team single elimination bracket to find the best team in the world!

ROUND ROBIN STAGE

The 6 teams are seeded into two groups: Group A and Group B. Each group will play a Round Robin style tournament, where teams from each group will play all other teams within that group. As there are 3 teams in each group, each team will play a total of 2 Wars in the Round Robin stage. After completing the Round Robin Wars, the top 2 teams from each Group will advance to the second stage, the Single Elimination Bracket. Teams will be seeded into each Group as followsâ€¦

Group A:

April Finalist: Synchronic Gaming

July Finalist: NAVI

China Regional Finalist: M.T.F.YÂ 

Group B:

May Finalist: STMN Esports

June Finalist: Millesime MG

Last Chance Qualifier Finalist: Tribe Gaming

SINGLE ELIMINATION BRACKET

The top 4 teams from the Round Robin Stage will then be seeded into a Single Elimination Bracket, consisting of two semi-final matches followed by a Grand Finals match to decide it all! In the first round, teams that placed first within their group will play against the runner-up team from the other group.

As a final note, the World Championship Finals will be played on Hard Mode. Make sure to check up on the Master Ruleset for more details on the World Championship Finals format!

The World Championship Finals will take place during SuperFEST 2024 over three days, November 1 - 3, with the Round Robin Stage occurring during the first two event days and the Single Elimination Bracket occurring on the final day! The Clash of Clans World Championship Finals will start each event day at SuperFest, starting at 8:00 UTC! Visit the SuperFest Article to take a closer look at the SuperFest schedule!

PARTICIPATING TEAMS

The 6 teams, and their respective players, participating in the World Championship Finals are as followsâ€¦

Synchronic Gaming consists of General X, Marc, Simon, Philipp & Einstein

STMN Esports consists of Fluxxy, Synthe, Hawk, Ninj & Dark

Millesime MG consists of Kingsman, TryHard, Natchoa, Teemper & Max

NAVI consists of GAKU, STARs, Kazuma, Klaus & Yatta

Tribe Gaming consists of Cronos, Nebrax, Riqirez, Excosist & Jojo23

M.T.F.Y consists of Cloud, Ming, Shuai, Xiyan & Xuan

OFFICIAL TALENT

Weâ€™ve got a star-studded cast for the World Championship Finals broadcast! The mainstays CarbonFin and iTzu return once again, while ClashBashing and Judo Sloth will return for the second time during #ClashWorlds 2024!

CarbonFin

iTzu

Judo Sloth

ClashBashing

Community Casters will also be returning for the World Championship Finals! Take a look at the full list belowâ€¦

Spanish: Zolokotroko, shioN, SOCKERS

Portuguese: Bruna7Cr, Rafa COC, Marinaul

French: Optimus Prime COC, Skarex

German: Noobs iMTV, eVe MAXI

Italian: Haplo80, Medda87

Korean: Fada, JAEJINCOC

Japanese: Yuta14, Keisuke

Turkish: Emre Kara

Filipino: Boss LA

Indonesian: Ciduk Warrior

Russian: Salomon

Hindi: AIJAZ222

WHERE TO WATCH

Look no further - the Clash of Clans Event Site is the best location to watch the World Championship Finals, make predictions, and earn in-game rewards! Think you know which teams have the best shot at claiming the World Championship Finals trophy? Want to earn rewards by answering #ClashWorlds trivia AND just by watching your favorite teams clash in the biggest event of the year? The Event Site has it all! Sign in with your Supercell ID on the Clash of Clans Event Site to get access to all the rewards you see in the graphic below!

The Clash of Clans Event Site has 8 language options you can choose from: English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Italian, Korean, & Japanese!

Thatâ€™s it, Chief! Mark your calendars and stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure youâ€™re up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related, and check out the Master Ruleset if you have any questions!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

entry.title: Rewatch Day 1 of the World Championship Finals!
Rewatch Day 2 of the World Championship Finals!
Rewatch Day 3 of the World Championship Finals!
Congratulations, Synchronic Gaming!
entry.content:
CONGRATULATIONS TO THE WORLD CHAMPIONS - SYNCHRONIC GAMING!

Hi, Chief!

The 2024 #ClashWorlds year has been a wild ride - Four monthly competitions, multiple Community Tournaments, a China Regional Qualifier and the Last Chance Qualifier all led to the World Championship Finals at SuperFEST. After three days of the highest-level competitive Clash of Clans match actionâ€¦

The Clash of Clans World Champions have been crowned!

Synchronic Gaming has been DOMINANT all year! They were the first team to secure their Golden Ticket and their spot at World Championship Finals, after winning in April! And it was an impressive Monthly Finals victory at that! After falling to the Lower Bracket after the first War, they went on to win five straight Wars, taking back-to-back victories against NAVI in the Grand Finals and the Grand Finals reset!

Now, at the World Championship Finals, their performance was no less impressive. In the Day 1 Group Stage, they went undefeated against M.T.F.Y and NAVI with two Perfect Wars, securing their spot in the Day 3 Single Elimination Bracket! When Day 3 came, Synchronic Gaming was ready. They started off the day by taking down Millesime MG in the semi-finals before moving to face off against Tribe Gaming in the Grand Finals. In the end, Synchronic Gaming showed they have the strongest defensive prowess in the world, holding Tribe Gaming to just 11 Stars!

Synchronic Gaming has claimed the World Championship Finals trophy and largest share of the $1,000,000 prize pool!

Congratulations to General X, Einstein, Philipp, Marc & Simon!

Rewatch the epic three-day showdown of Synchronic Gaming's road to the World Championship Finals trophy!

ðŸ“º [EMBEDDED VIDEO] ðŸ“º [EMBEDDED VIDEO] ðŸ“º [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

Want to Clash like the 2024 World Champions? Look no further! Synchronic Gaming shared the Base Layouts they used to secure their spot at the top! Check them out below...

General X's Base:

- Clan Castle Troops include 2 Ice Golems, 3 Headhunters, and 2 Archers

- Builder: General X

Marc's Base:

- Clan Castle Troops include 2 Ice Golems, 2 Headhunters, 4 Archers, and 4 Goblins

- Builder: General X

Einstein's Base:

- Clan Castle Troops include 2 Ice Golems, 3 Headhunters, and 2 Archers

- Builder: General X

Simon's Base:

- Clan Castle Troops include 2 Ice golems, 2 Headhunters, 4 Goblins, and 4 Archers

- Builder: General X

Philipp's Base:

- Clan Castle Troops include 2 Ice Golems, 2 Headhunters, 4 Archers, and 4 Goblins

- Builder: General X

A HUGE thank you and congratulations to all players and teams who competed throughout the 2024 #ClashWorlds year - and, of course, to the fans who have been following their journeys as well! The conclusion of the World Championship Finals at SuperFEST wraps up the year! Stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to learn more about future plans and to make sure you're up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team
